name: Heliophobia
description: Heliophobia is a first-person horror/mystery adventure presented through a surreal, non-linear narrative. You awake on a vacant plane, given only a singular task: kill the one with the initials "J.R.".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Core HD 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 12 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
